content.description:
Heads directly up the prow through a v6 crux into easier 11a/b climbing above.

Variation: FITNESS ME! (5.12c-) - Climb through the crux, then rejoin Welcome to Thunderdome. Slightly easier finish, but relatively same grade due to the crux.
content.protection:
7 bolts + anchors, and an optional belayers bolt. A permadraw protects the crux, and should be clip-able from a reasonable stance (unless you're an ultra shorty).

An attentive belayer is required for the upper section as one of the clips could result in a butt-buster against the back wall if blown at the exact wrong moment.

content.description:
Move through blocky terrain before unlocking the crux that guards the prow. Navigate the excellent crimps in the prow before finagling, grunting, or finessing your way into the dihedral alcove. Enjoy a perfect rest before glory jugs at the top.

Variation: My Name is Max (5.11a/b PG-13) - Head left at the 5th bolt to finish up "WITNESS ME!".

Head up consistently difficult blocky terrain until an interesting mantel-esque move to Bartertown Ledge.

Take a breather, then head up the roof above and right of Bartertown's dihedral.

Climb blocky terrain to a headwall before a small roof. Conquer the roof, then head up toward the giant block-tower. Avoid the urge to head into the rest provided by Bartertown, instead heading left along another roof. Maintain the pump until you reach the clipping jugs at the top.

Follow 5 bolts to a small roof and make a big move to the shelf (1st crux). Go straight up to a rest on the massive pedestal, ignoring the bolt out left for Master Blaster, then follow 2 bolts and great edges through the clean dihedral above. 2nd crux just before the chains.
content.location: Start in the middle of the wall to the right of Welcome to Thunderdome.
